select t.*,i.name InpatientName,i.HealthCard,olddept.deptname OldDeptName ,oldward.deptname OldWardName,currentdept.deptname CurrentDeptName,currentward.deptname CurrentWardName from CD_TRANSFER t left join CD_INPATIENT i on i.inpatientid=t.inpatientid left join AI_DEPTINFO olddept on olddept.Deptid=t.olddeptid left join AI_DEPTINFO oldward on oldward.Deptid=t.oldwardid left join AI_DEPTINFO currentdept on currentdept.Deptid=t.currentdeptid left join AI_DEPTINFO currentward on currentward.Deptid=t.currentwardid
i.Name like '%#Name#%' (i.InpatientId=:Zyh or i.HealthCard=:Zyh) t.CurrentDeptID=:CurrentDeptID t.OldDeptID=:OldDeptID t.ConversionTime > to_date('#ConversionTimeStart# 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') t.ConversionTime < to_date('#ConversionTimeStop# 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
order by ConversionTime desc
